name: 4-LOM With Concussion Rifle (V)
Lore: 'Accomplished thief and information broker. Modified by Jabba to be an effective bounty hunter. The Hutt often teams 4-LOM with other hired killers.',
Text: 'Permanent weapon is •4-LOM''s Concussion Rifle (may target a character for free; target is power -1).  Once per turn, may place a card from hand on bottom of Used Pile to draw top card from Reserve Deck.',
